Verses: 1 dhevan Illai Endru Madhigedan Than Irudhayaththil Sollikkollugiraan; Avargal Thangalaik Keduththu, Aruvaruppaana Akkiramangalaich Seydhuvarugiraargal; Nanmai Seygiravan Oruvanum Illai.
2 dhevanaith Thedugira Unarvullavan Undo Endru Paarkka, Dhevan Paralogaththilirundhu Manupuththiraraik Kannokkinaar.
3 avargal Ellaarum Vazhivilagi, Egamaaik Kettupponaargal; Nanmai Seygiravan Illai, Oruvanaagilum Illai.
4 akkiramakkaararukku Arivu Illaiyaa? Appaththaip Patchikkiradhupol En Janaththaip Patchikkiraargale; Avargal Dhevanaith Thozhudhukollugiradhillai.

5 unakku Virodhamaaip Paalayamiranginavanudaiya Elumbugalai Dhevan Sidharappanninabadiyaal, Bayamillaadha Idaththil Migavum Bayandhaargal; Dhevan Avargalai Veruththapadiyinaal Nee Avargalai Vetkappaduththinaai.
6 seeyonilirundhu Isravelukku Ratchippu Varuvadhaaga, Dhevan Thammudaiya Janaththin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppumbodhu, Yaakkobukkuk Kalippum Isravelukku Magizhchchiyum Undaagum.
